name: Radar (Novemtails)
description:
It is 2128 and all the big cities are taken over by cybernetics, robots who built themselves and now hate and attack their creator, the human. 

As a member of the R.A.D.A.R agency, you have a mission to clean the streets of them. You will have to look for the 5 energy stones using your radar and take them to the generator that controls the sentinels to make it explode.

Be careful, sentinels are very sensitive to sound and may detect you when you walk near them or activate your radar.

Radar is a third person stealth game in a post-apocalyptic world.

Note for Mac osX Big Sur users: 

You can run this command on terminal: sudo chmod -R 755 Mac.app. Then right click and open the file

Compatible with keyboard and mouse and XBOX and PS controls

Developed by @novemtails
Music by Matias Panto
